title: Router Resets when playing LOL
body: Can some one help me please. for some reason since the new season only when i play league my router resets for no reason. it happens every game around the 6-7 min mark.

replies.body:
I've seen this a few times in the past. It usually ended up being caused by a router/modem that was already on its way out due to old age or premature failure. I recommend swapping out a different router so we can determine if this is caused specifically by the router or if it's something else entirely.

Let me know what you find out~
